Smart Wi-Fi Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for remote control and smart home integration, e.g. wireless app-controlled dimmers, voice assistant compatible dimmers

Smart Hub-Based Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches that require a separate hub or bridge for smart functionality and connectivity, e.g. hub-dependent smart dimmers, bridge-connected lighting controls

Toggle Slide Dimmer Switches.definition: Traditional dimmer switches with toggle on/off and sliding dimmer control mechanisms, e.g. slide-control dimmers, toggle-slide combination switches

Touch Control Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches operated by touch-sensitive controls rather than mechanical switches, e.g. touch-activated dimmers, capacitive touch light controls

Digital Display Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches featuring digital displays or electronic interfaces for precise control, e.g. LCD dimmer controls, digital readout light switches

Rotary Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches controlled by rotating knobs or dials for brightness adjustment, e.g. dial-controlled dimmers, rotary brightness controls

Standard LED Dimmer Switches.definition: Traditional wall-mounted dimmer switches designed specifically for LED and other dimmable bulbs, e.g. wall-plate dimmers, conventional brightness controls

Dual Function Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches that control both lighting and fan functions in a single unit, e.g. fan-light combination controls, dual-purpose dimmer switches

Low Voltage Dimmer Switches.definition: Specialized dimmer switches for low voltage lighting systems and commercial applications, e.g. 0-10V dimmers, commercial LED panel controls

Wireless Companion Switches.definition: Wireless remote controls and companion devices for multi-location dimmer control, e.g. wireless remotes, companion switch accessories

Slide Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with sliding controls for adjusting light levels, e.g. slide dimmers, linear slide controls

Rocker Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with rocker-style controls for light adjustment, e.g. rocker dimmers, paddle dimmers

Smart Dimmer Switches.definition: WiFi or wireless enabled dimmer switches with smart home connectivity, e.g. WiFi dimmers, smart home dimmers, app-controlled dimmers

Touch Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches operated by touch controls rather than mechanical switches, e.g. touch-activated dimmers, tap dimmers

Toggle Dimmer Switches.definition: Traditional toggle-style dimmer switches with flip controls, e.g. toggle dimmers, flip-style dimmers

Standard Dimmer Switches.definition: Basic dimmer switches without specialized control mechanisms, e.g. conventional dimmers, basic light dimmers

Plug In Dimmer Switches.definition: Portable dimmer controls that plug into outlets for table lamps and portable lighting, e.g. lamp dimmers, plug-in light controls

Motion Sensor Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with integrated motion detection for automatic lighting control, e.g. occupancy sensor dimmers, motion-activated dimmers

Companion Dimmer Switches.definition: Secondary dimmer switches designed to work with primary dimmers in multi-location setups, e.g. remote dimmers, auxiliary dimmers
